TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit IntegratedPipelineExtensions extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Extension methods used to indicate at which stage in the integrated pipeline prior middleware should run.

static member UseStageMarker : Owin.IAppBuilder * Owin.PipelineStage -> Owin.IAppBuilder

Docs.param: The stage of the integrated pipeline in which to run.
Docs.summary: Call after other middleware to specify when they should run in the integrated pipeline.
